resources.string: AngryMooseAndroid
This app was made by Łukasz Zarębski, known as TheLKL

Press a button to make your move. Your goal is to decrease the moose\'s health to 0 without dying yourself. Moves: Attack - you attempt to throw a punch Kick - you try to kick the moose Leap - you throw yourself on the floor to evade an attack Dodge - you step to the side, doing a light dodge Throw dirt - you grab a handful of earth to chuck it at the beast\'s eyes In the middle of the screen you\'ll find an event log. Use it to find out about mooses actions and their consequences Watch out! The beast can feast on wild berries to heal himself Good luck!
You ran away like a baby
The moose will laugh about you with his friends
The moose lowers it\'s head, pointing its antlers towards you
A terrifying roar spreads through the forest
The animal takes a step back
The moose found some fresh berries
The beast raises his leg
The moose turns around
The beast is blinded and misses its charge
The moose is blinded and hits a tree
The dirt fails to blind the moose. It charges at you
The dodge failed and the charging moose smashes into you
Your dodge was successful, the beast charges past you
The moose grazes you slightly as it charges beside you
You throw yourself on the ground but the moose tramples you anyway
The enemy charges, you hit the ground and hurt your ankle
The enemy charges, you hit the ground and hurt your arm
You successfully evade the charging moose
The charging moose hits a tree!
You manage to kick the moose before its charge
The moose charges at you, striking your chest
Somehow, you managed to do some damage
The moose charges at you, striking your chest
Your throw is ineffective, the moose hits you anyway
The moose is distracted by the dirt, you escape any harm
You dodge the animal\'s attack
The moose grazed your shoulder
You dodge the moose\'s attack, but stumbled and hit your knee
You fall to the ground and the animal mangles you terribly
You fall to the ground needlessly and pay for it
You fall to the ground, but manage to recover before the moose does much damage
Your kick is too slow and the enemy attack lands
Your kick is unexpected and so the moose fails to react
You land a punch before the animal attacks
You both miss and stare at each other confused
Your hand gets stuck in antlers
You throw some dirt at the moose. It\'s not very effective…
Thanks to the defensive position, the moose foresaw your move
Trying to shake off the dirt, the beast hits a tree
You both take a defensive stance. Awkward…
You hit the ground and hurt your ankle
You hit the ground and hurt your arm
You hit the ground as the moose takes a defensive stance
The moose\'s defensive stance fails to stop you
The moose\'s defensive stance allows him to counter
The moose\'s defensive stance fails to stop you
The moose\'s defensive stance allows him to counter
You throw dirt at an eating moose. Rude.
The dirt lands in the berries and destroys the meal. The moose will remember this
You step back, allowing the moose to eat peacefully. He smiles in gratitude
You allow the animal to find even more berries. How nice!
You drop to the ground and allow the moose to eat his berries
You hit the ground, hurting your ankle as the moose eats
You hit the ground, hurting your arm as the moose eats
You drop to the ground, which lets the animal find even more berries
You steal the berries and eat them
You take advantage of the distraction and land a blow
You miss and allow the moose to eat his berries
You manage to deny the meal
You try to take the berries, but that makes the animal very mad
You steal the berries and eat them
You miss and allow the moose to eat his berries
You take advantage of the situation, but the berries get lost in the tumble
You try to take the berries, but that makes the animal very mad
Confused moose hits his head on a branch
The moose kicks dirt into your eyes, you can\'t see
The moose kicks dirt into your eyes as you throw some into his. You both take a moment
The moose kicks dirt into the air, but you dodge it gracefully
The moose kicks dirt into your eyes, you stumble and fall
The moose kicks dirt into your eyes, you can\'t see
You dodge the attack, but hurt your ankle
You dodge the attack, but hurt your arm
You hit the ground as the moose kicks dirt at you
The fiend kicks dirt at your eyes, and counters your attack
Despite the dirt kicked at your eyes you manage to do some damage
The fiend kicks dirt at your eyes, and counters your attack
Despite the dirt kicked at your eyes you manage to do some damage
You throw dirt at its butt. It doesn\'t care and kicks your face
You throw dirt at its butt and get kicked in stomach
You throw dirt at its butt and get kicked in your arm
Your dodge wasn\'t enough, you get kicked in chest
You stumbled and fell, but you dodged the kick
Somehow you manage to dodge the kick
You successfully evade the kick
You evaded the kick, but hit a rock on the ground
The beast misses and hits a rock
You dodge the kick, but hurt your ankle
You dodge the kick, but hurt your arm
Your unexpected assault brings results
You try to kick the moose, but get stopped by a kick to the chest
You try to kick the moose, but get stopped by a kick to the shoulder
You land a kick as the beast\'s hoof grazes your shoulder
You try to punch the animal, but get kicked in the head instead
You landed a fortunate blow, before the beast could react
A huge moose stands in front of you
Do you want to give up?
